CatDescriptText: Richards Scott, student, Third Ward was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 9, 1960, pg. A1, with question: "Whom do you think the Democratic and the Republican parties will choose for their respective presidential candidates? Why?" Answer reads: "It probably will be Kennedy, because he is the most popular.  I think the Republicans will nominate Nixon."
TitMainTitle: Richard Scott standing in front of C. A. Michel store window, Smithfield Street, Downtown
